Message.Title: Thousands of items from China for $2.00 and shipping is free that weigh 1 to 5 ounces
Message.Msg: The minimum cost for American ebayers is $1.65 shipping + .30 paypal fee + .30 package and label cost $2.25 is a fixed cost for every item that weighs over an ounce that is sold by an American Ebayer, yet China Ebayers are selling thousands of items for $1.99 Net..This can only mean one thing.. They are getting a discount from our postal system and Ebay is charging them less fees for paypal and final value..
Gee, you're joking right? eBay, PayPal, GSI Commerce.... they are not going anywhere. In fact, if this Co does not hit $100/share in two years I will be shocked.
